settings.collapsible_tab_text:
AquaCal offers a 30-day return policy for heaters, though the customer is responsible for all shipping charges associated with the return. Returns not related to defects will also incur a 25% restocking fee.

AquaCal guarantees that the product you receive will be fully functional and operational. If you happen to receive a defective product, we will handle the pickup and replacement process at no additional cost to you. For further questions, please reach out to us at support@mygaragesupplies.com.

AquaCal® has been the world’s leading heat pump manufacturer since 1981, with more pool and spa heat pumps installed than any other brand. Committed to quality, every unit is 100% tested before leaving the factory.

AquaCal® continually pioneers industry-leading heat pump technology, backed by a state-of-the-art Research and Development facility and a dedicated Engineering team.

With a strong focus on performance and durability, AquaCal® ensures long-lasting, high-quality products, all supported by an unbeatable warranty, reflecting the company’s dedication to excellence.
